title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES:
EB: It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES:
SR: In a workspace with many project, export Zip.2. Select all project.3. Select file tyoes, choose some. Press ok.4.
